name: Poor Mister Bubble(LD37)
description:
Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 37 (My first Ludum Dare)

Use the arrow keys to move Mister Bubble, collect Coins,

and avoid Ninja Stars! Crates give you Extra Coins but will trigger

a random Event!

Yes, I didn't have enough time so I rushed the graphics and I have not added any music... hope you still enjoy the game! :)

Ludum Dare submission link:http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=72452
